name: Mumei no Toshi
description:
It is a fan game starring virtual YouTuber "Nanashi Mumei" belonging to Cover Co., Ltd.

This game is still in development, and bugs that lack content or interfere with play may be found. If you leave it in the comments, it will be of great help to the developer

Streamers belonging to Cover Co., Ltd. do not have to obtain separate permission from the producer when using this game as stream content. 

If it weren't for her, I wouldn't still be doing anything in despair and pain. I dedicate this game to Nanashi Mumei, who gave me strength and courage.
